SELECT ROWNUM RN , T1.* FROM ( SELECT A.REQ_ID AS REQ_ID , A.REQ_NM AS REQ_NM , A.REQ_ORD AS REQ_ORD , A.REQ_PRO_TYPE AS REQ_PRO_TYPE , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00008', A.REQ_PRO_TYPE, '1') AS REQ_PRO_TYPE_NM , TO_CHAR(A.REQ_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REQ_DTM , NVL2(A.REQ_PW, 'Y', 'N') AS REQ_PW FROM REQ4100 A JOIN SPR1100 B ON (A.REQ_ID = B.REQ_ID AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = B.PRJ_GRP_ID AND B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#) WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND B.SPR_ID = #sprId#
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
DESC
ASC
ORDER BY A.REQ_DTM DESC
) T1 WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT ROWNUM RN , T1.* FROM ( SELECT A.REQ_ID AS REQ_ID , A.REQ_NM AS REQ_NM , A.REQ_ORD AS REQ_ORD , A.REQ_PRO_TYPE AS REQ_PRO_TYPE , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00008', A.REQ_PRO_TYPE, '1') AS REQ_PRO_TYPE_NM , TO_CHAR(A.REQ_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REQ_DTM , NVL2(A.REQ_PW, 'Y', 'N') AS REQ_PW FROM REQ4100 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT B.REQ_ID AS REQ_ID FROM SPR1100 B WHERE 1 = 1 AND B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND B.PRJ_GRP_ID = A.PRJ_GRP_ID AND B.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID AND B.SPR_ID = #sprId# AND B.REQ_ID = A.REQ_ID )
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
DESC
ASC
ORDER BY A.REQ_DTM DESC
) T1 WHERE 1 = 1
